text: Pi is a 1998 American psychological thriller movie. It was directed by Darren Aronofsky. It is about a mathematician who wants to know the secret of Pi. == Other websites == * Category:1998 drama movies Category:1990s psychological movies Category:1998 thriller movies Category:American drama movies Category:American psychological movies Category:American thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Darren Aronofsky Category:Movies set in Brooklyn Category:Movies set in New York City Category:American independent movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies about Jews and Judaism
title: Pi (movie)
